snippet: Nakoula Basseley Nakoula, one of the men behind the anti-Muslim film trailer that has sparked violent protests, was taken in for questioning by federal probation officers.
abstract: Nakoula Basseley Nakoula, one of the men behind the anti-Muslim film trailer that has sparked violent protests across the Muslim world, is taken in for questioning by federal probation officers at the Los Angeles County sheriff's station.

byline.contributor: Charlie Savage contributed reporting from Washington.

lead_paragraph: Nakoula Basseley Nakoula, one of the men behind the anti-Muslim film trailer that has sparked violent protests, was taken in for questioning by federal probation officers.

headline.main: Man Linked to Film in Protests Is Questioned
headline.print_headline: Man Linked To Film In Protests Is Questioned
